thread.section_title: AMOMA.com Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von AMOMA.com | www.amoma.com
thread.title: Jon

author: Jon
title: Jon
text: On other sites the Ski resort I was considering was fully booked with the exception of a few lower class establishments out of town. I came across a room available on Amoma for a great hotel on the slopes and a 'not bad' price so decided to book it. Was a little dubious once booked based on some other reviews however the process could not have been smoother. Good comms from Amoma, hotel had reservation on their system - couldn't have asked for more...
